name: Vitalik Buterin
about: An experienced superhero. Skilled in preventing market crashes, putting villains in prison & yes, saving humanity. In my free time, I lead the Ethereum Organization. Oh, and I also like cats & canine.

experiences.description: Ethereum is a blockchain-based distributed computing platform & OS with a $85 bn. market cap. Published the original Ethereum whitepaper to lay down the base of the blockchain. Led Ethereum to a $85 bn. market capitalization within 4 years of inception.
Bitcoin Magazine is the oldest online Bitcoin publication with 2.3+ million visitors per month.

accomplishments: Most matched person: 2,000+ right swipes on Tinder
